attributes.action: Increase pay for NHS nurses to a min of 3%
attributes.additional_details: The NHS staff have worked so hard over the pandemic whilst other people have been furloughed and paid by the government.  To then offer a pay increase of 1% is an insult to our NHS staff
attributes.background: We would like the government to take nurses and the NHS staff seriously.  We would like parliament to increase NHS staff nurses and workers pay to minimum of 3% not 1%

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071
